addr: Raindance Fil Centre, 10a Craven Street, London, WC2n 5PE
title: Raindance Open House
desc: He?s cool, tall and wears sunglasses 24/7. He also helped shape the careers of Edgar Wright, Christopher Nolan and Guy Ritchie. Here?s your chance to share a drink. Come along and meet the award-winning filmmakers who teach courses at Raindance. Also present will be the team responsible for the Raindance Film Festival - Britain's largest and most successful independent film festival. Like producers and paperwork guys and YouTubers who can help you get funding or submit your movie or build an audience for your movie. Once the tutors have finished we'll be opening the wine. Mingle with other filmmakers and those who are looking to dip their toes in the water. Great film partnerships have been formed at Raindance and this may be the start of a beautiful friendship. All this and raffle prizes too! ***?Presentations start at 7:00pm Drinks at 8:30pm Anyone interested in making a film or getting into the film industry; anyone interested in the Raindance Film Festival; anyone who wants to know more about Raindance ? "Lovely meeting you all for the first time on Thursday evening. It was a very helpful event for a first timer to attend, and for more experienced people I'm sure, but as a career-changer, I found it answered all the questions I had brought with me as a newbie to the industry. Thank you all."
